slide.title: President Abdul Hamid attends the prayers from Bangabhaban. Photo: Rashed Shumon, PID
Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina participates from Gono Bhaban. Photo: Rashed Shumon, PID
BNP Chairperson Khaleda Zia follows suit from the rooftop of Atlas (Honda) Factory in Tongi. Photo: Rashed Shumon, PID
